name: DocuBox
description: DocuBox je dokumentarni kanal koji pruža nezaboravnu kolekciju fascinantnih i nagrađivanih dokumentarnih programa o istraživanju svih misterija i ljepota našeg planeta.

name: Doku TV
description: DOKU TV je kanal čiji se program prikazuje 24 sata dnevno i koji obiluje raznovrsnim dokumentarcima koje je, jedan po jedan, odabrao upravo Đelo Hadžiselimović. Tematski, program sadržava putopise, teme iz kulture, ekologije, znanosti, povijesti, glazbe, ali se bavi i avanturama, lifestyleom, slavnim osobama i aktualnim događanjima.

name: E!
description: E! nudi vrhunsku propusnicu za pristup ekskluzivnom svijetu zabave, uključuje visokobudžetne reality programe i vijesti iz svijeta poznatih iz SAD-a. Kanal svjetski poznatih emisija, poput 'Keeping Up With the Kardashians', 'E! News' i 'Live from the Red Carpet', E! je obvezna i neponovljiva destinacija za najnovije informacije u pop kulturi.

name: Star Movies
description: STAR Movies kanal posebno je posvećen emitiranju najboljih filmova koji će zadovoljiti i najzahtjevnije gledatelje. Preko njega, publika ima pristup najboljim svjetskim filmskim ostvarenjima. Svake godine donosi preko 300 premijera pokrivajući široki spektar filmskih žanrova: od najboljih komedija, snažnih drama, akcijskih filmova punih adrenalina do horor filmova. Gledatelji će moći uživati u visoko budžetnim blockbusterima, klasicima, filmovima snažnih producentskih kuća kao što su 20th Century Fox, Sony Pictures Entertainment, NBC Universal, Disney, Paramount Pictures, ali i brojnim filmovima nezavisne produkcije.

name: NASA TV Public
description: NASA TV airs a variety of regularly scheduled, pre-recorded educational and public relations programming 24 hours a day on its various channels. The network also provides an array of live programming, such as 24-hour coverage of missions, events (spacewalks, media interviews, educational broadcasts), press conferences and rocket launches.

name: NASA TV Media
description: NASA TV airs a variety of regularly scheduled, pre-recorded educational and public relations programming 24 hours a day on its various channels. The network also provides an array of live programming, such as 24-hour coverage of missions, events (spacewalks, media interviews, educational broadcasts), press conferences and rocket launches.

description: NASA TV airs a variety of regularly scheduled, pre-recorded educational and public relations programming 24 hours a day on its various channels. The network also provides an array of live programming, such as 24-hour coverage of missions, events (spacewalks, media interviews, educational broadcasts), press conferences and rocket launches.

name: Red Bull TV
description: The channel is a home for live events and programs on sports, music, and lifestyle/culture, including unbranded original programming.

name: Crime 360
description: Crime 360, your true crime destination, covering crime all the time.

name: Afrobeats 24/7 TV
description: Afrobeats are primarily produced in Lagos, Accra and London. Paul Gilroy of The Black Atlantic reflects on the changing London music scene as a result of changing demographics: 'We are moving towards an African majority that is diverse in both its cultural habits and its relationship to colonial and post-colonial governance, so the move away from Caribbean domination needs to be placed in this environment'. Afro-pop (not to be confused with Afrobeat or Afroswing), also known as Afro-fusion (also called Afropop and Afrofusion), is an umbrella term used to describe popular music from West Africa and the diaspora originally developed in Nigeria.

name: TV 538
description: Slušanje online radija ne nudi samo glazbu, već i razne radijske programe. Započnite (kućni) radni dan s The 538 Morning Show s Timom Klijnom, Rickom Romijnom, Nielsom van Baarlenom i Florentienom van der Meulenom, a završite ga s The 538 Afternoon s Frankom Daneom, Jelte van der Goot i Airen Mylene. Započnite vikend s De Coen i Sander Showom, Coenom Swijnenbergom i Sanderom Lantingom, a završite ga s De 538 TOP 50 s Dennisom Ruyerom.

name: RTL Televizija
description: RTL TELEVIZIJA je hrvatska komercijalna televizija u 74 postotnom vlasništvu RTL Grupe. Od samog početka emitiranja donosi najsvježije informacije iz zemlje i svijeta putem informativnih vijesti koje su sastavni dio svakodnevnog emitiranja. RTL Televizija također obiluje sadržajem vlastite produkcije, kao što su magazin Exkluziv Tabloid, zabavni kviz Tog se nitko nije sjetio! te reality show Ljubav je na selu. Televizija također emitira i veliki broj stranih serija, pretežito američke i njemačke produkcije te premijerno prikazuje neke od najvećih hollywoodskih blockbustera, kao i klasične televizijske filmove.

name: Al Jazeera Balkans
description: Al Jazeera Balkans međunarodna je televizijska postaja mreže Al Jazeera. Dvadeset sati sadržaja postaja samostalno proizvodi na bošnjačkom, hrvatskom i srpskom jeziku, dok ostatak čini program Al Jazeere English.

name: DW English
description: Deutsche Welle (DW) is Germany’s international broadcaster and one of the most successful and relevant international media outlets.

name: CBS News Miami
description: CBS News Miami is your streaming home for breaking news, weather, traffic and sports for the Miami area and beyond. Watch 24/7.

name: CBS News New York
description: CBS News New York is hyper local news streaming 24/7... for free! It's the Tri-State area's place to get top stories, breaking news, weather, traffic and more. Check us out. We're always on.

name: CBS News Los Angeles
description: CBS News Los Angeles is hyper local news streaming 24/7... for free! It's SoCal's place to get top stories, breaking news, weather, traffic and more. Check us out. We're always on.

name: CNN International Europe
description: CNN je skraćenica za Cable News Network i danas je najpoznatiji međunarodni 24-satni informativni kanal koji se emitira putem satelita i kabelske televizije. CNN je televizijska mreža posvećena isključivo vijestima i informativnom programu.

name: Pluto TV Space
description: Pluto TV Space goes to infinity and beyond for you! On this channel, we discover new worlds and show you that there is a so much more to discover. This is a compilation the best factual programmes about Space and new frontiers that are out there. Prepare to be amazed and learn something new every minute of Pluto TV Space.

name: Stingray Naturescape

name: Earth TV
description: EarthTV Network GmbH je njemačka satelitska televizijska mreža koja emitira prijenose uživo sa svoje mreže kamera diljem svijeta. Kamere se nalaze u poznatim gradovima kao i u manje poznatim mjestima. EarthTV kamere obično prikazuju plaže, planine, primorska odmarališta ili obrise velikih gradova.

name: CMC TV
description: CROATIAN MUSIC CHANNEL je hrvatski glazbeni kanal koji emitira isključivo hrvatsku glazbu. Program nastoji 24-satnim programom prvenstveno zadovoljiti interes gledatelja za hrvatsku glazbu, i to cijeli spektar glazbenih ukusa hrvatskog puka od klasične, klapske ili tamburaške glazbe, pa sve do rocka, popa, techno, dance ili house glazbe. Program donosi i tjednu listu najslušanije glazbe u emisiji CMC Top 30 kao i top liste službeno najprodavanijih diskografskih albuma domaće i strane glazbene scene.

name: Klape i Tambure TV
description: Klape i tambure TV novi je televizijski program na kojem svaki dan, 24 sata dnevno, sedam dana u tjednu možete uživati u najvećim klapskim i tamburaškim hitovima.

name: Banovina TV
description: Televizija Banovina svakodnevnim programom od 0 do 24, uz širok glazbeni opus domaće zabavne i pop, narodne i folk, tamburaške i tradicionalne glazbe, pruža mnoštvo informacija kroz svoj svakodnevni program te u dnevnim i tjednim emisijama.

name: Pluto TV True Crime
description: The most gripping stories are always the ones that are true. On Pluto TV True Crime, watch series and documentaries delving into all areas of criminal justice, from the hunt for killers to the drama inside the courtroom.

name: Star Trek
description: STAR TREK: Boldly go to the channel that brings you the continuing mission of the USS Enterprise with both Star Trek: The Original Series and Star Trek: The Next Generation. Beam aboard any time of day on Pluto TV.

name: Pluto TV Sci-Fi
description: Explore the farthest reaches of space, battle evil robots, and travel through time on Pluto TV Sci-Fi, the mothership for the best science fiction and fantasy movies and TV series in the galaxy, beaming up to you 24 hours a day.

name: FailArmy
description: Non-stop FailArmy action, with your daily dose of fails and hilarious videos.

name: Always Funny Videos
description: Always Funny Videos is family-friendly comedy programming from the creators of America's Funniest Home Videos. 24/7 Laughs delivered in hilarious comedy home videos that are funny for all ages!

name: Star Trek 2
description: Boldly go to the channel that brings you Star Trek: The Next Generation, along with the USS Enterprise's big-screen adventures, all day long.

name: More Star Trek
description: Seeking new life and new civilizations? There is always more to explore on More Star Trek. Explore the farthest reaches of the galaxy, all day every day, right here on Pluto TV.

name: Unsolved Mysteries
description: What you are about to see is NOT a news broadcast. Watch classic episodes of Unsolved Mysteries with the great Robert Stack 24/7 on this eerie channel. Who knows? Perhaps YOU can help solve a mystery...

name: Cold Case Files
description: When an investigation runs out of leads, it becomes a cold case. Watch Cold Case Files on its own 24/7 Pluto TV channel as police and detectives use forensic advances and new evidence to crack decades old true-crime cases.

name: MST3K
description: MST3K (Mystery Science Theater 3000) 24/7 brought to you by Shout! Factory TV.

name: Hallmark Movies & More
description: Your home to a curated selection of movies, series & specials from the Hallmark library filled with uplifting and inspiring stories for everyone.

name: Stargate
description: Chevrons are locked, the iris is open and we are ready to explore the universe with Stargate on Pluto TV. Teams from Stargate SG-1, Stargate Atlantis, and Stargate Universe will be jumping through the Gate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

name: DeLuxe Lounge
description: Pure relaxation for the eyes and ears. Special-interest music station with lounge sounds and high-definition nature recordings. High-quality images of beautiful landscapes and city shots combined with fantastic lounge music (down beat, chill out, ambient). That's all you need to relax.

name: DeLuxe Dance by Kontor
description: Legendary club hits, massive chart breakers and the next trends. KONTOR RECORDS and DELUXE MUSIC bring you the dance station you've always wanted. From Scooter and ATB to Robin Schulz and David Guetta to VIZE and Felix Jaehn.

name: One World TV
description: Tomorrowland will be returning to the breathtaking French ski resort and mountains of Alpe d’Huez in 2023 for the third edition of Tomorrowland Winter – scheduled to take place from March 18-25, 2023.

name: One World Radio
description: One World Radio is Tomorrowland's official digital radio & content platform, bringing you the sound of Tomorrowland.

name: Vibe To Beat
description: Looking for Best of European dance music? Tune in to the hottest dance music from across Europe. From chart-topping hits and underground classics, to exclusive mixes and live events.
